verses.verse: In the eighth <S%H8066><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%>, came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah <S%H1296><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo <S%H5714><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath been sore <S%H7110><s%> displeased <S%H7107><s%> with your fathers <S%H1><s%>. sore: Heb. with displeasure

Therefore say <S%H559><s%> thou unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Turn <S%H7725><s%> ye unto me, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, and I will turn <S%H7725><s%> unto you, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

Be ye not as your fathers <S%H1><s%>, unto whom the former <S%H7223><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> have cried <S%H7121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Turn <S%H7725><s%> ye now from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>, and from your evil <S%H7451><s%> doings <S%H4611><s%>: but they did not hear <S%H8085><s%>, nor hearken <S%H7181><s%> unto me, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
Your fathers <S%H1><s%>, where are they? and the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, do they live <S%H2421><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>?

But my words <S%H1697><s%> and my statutes <S%H2706><s%>, which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, did they not take hold <S%H5381><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>? and they returned <S%H7725><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, Like as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> thought <S%H2161><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> unto us, according to our ways <S%H1870><s%>, and according to our doings <S%H4611><s%>, so hath he dealt <S%H6213><s%> with us. take: or, overtake

Upon the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, which is the month <S%H2320><s%> Sebat <S%H7627><s%>, in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%>, came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah <S%H1296><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo <S%H5714><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

I saw <S%H7200><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>, and behold a man <S%H376><s%> riding <S%H7392><s%> upon a red <S%H122><s%> horse <S%H5483><s%>, and he stood <S%H5975><s%> among the myrtle trees <S%H1918><s%> that were in the bottom <S%H4699><s%>; and behind <S%H310><s%> him were there red <S%H122><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%>, speckled <S%H8320><s%>, and white <S%H3836><s%>. speckled: or, bay

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, O my lord <S%H113><s%>, what are these? And the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me said <S%H559><s%> unto me, I will shew <S%H7200><s%> thee what these be.

And the man <S%H376><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> among the myrtle trees <S%H1918><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, These are they whom the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> to and fro through the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> among the myrtle trees <S%H1918><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, We have walked to and fro <S%H1980><s%> through the earth <S%H776><s%>, and, behold, all the earth <S%H776><s%> sitteth still <S%H3427><s%>, and is at rest <S%H8252><s%>.

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, how long wilt thou not have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and on the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, against which thou hast had indignation <S%H2194><s%> these threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>?

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me with good <S%H2896><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> and comfortable <S%H5150><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>.

So the angel <S%H4397><s%> that communed <S%H1696><s%> with me said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Cry <S%H7121><s%> thou, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; I am jealous <S%H7065><s%> for Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and for Zion <S%H6726><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> jealousy <S%H7068><s%>.

And I am very <S%H1419><s%> sore <S%H7110><s%> displeased <S%H7107><s%> with the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that are at ease <S%H7600><s%>: for I was but a little <S%H4592><s%> displeased <S%H7107><s%>, and they helped <S%H5826><s%> forward the affliction <S%H7451><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; I am returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with mercies <S%H7356><s%>: my house <S%H1004><s%> shall be built <S%H1129><s%> in it, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, and a line <S%H6957><s%> <S%H6961><s%> shall be stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> upon Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

Cry <S%H7121><s%> yet, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; My cities <S%H5892><s%> through prosperity <S%H2896><s%> shall yet be spread abroad <S%H6327><s%>; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall yet comfort <S%H5162><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and shall yet choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>. prosperity: Heb. good
Then lifted I up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%>, and behold four <S%H702><s%> horns <S%H7161><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, What be these? And he answered <S%H559><s%> me, These are the horns <S%H7161><s%> which have scattered <S%H2219><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%>, Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shewed <S%H7200><s%> me four <S%H702><s%> carpenters <S%H2796><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, What come <S%H935><s%> these to do <S%H6213><s%>? And he spake <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, These are the horns <S%H7161><s%> which have scattered <S%H2219><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%>, so that <S%H6310><s%> no man <S%H376><s%> did lift up <S%H5375><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%>: but these are come <S%H935><s%> to fray <S%H2729><s%> them, to cast out <S%H3034><s%> the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%>, which lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their horn <S%H7161><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> to scatter <S%H2219><s%> it.
